headline: Broadridge price target lowered to $228 from $240 at DA Davidson
summary: DA Davidson lowered the firm’s price target on Broadridge (BR) to $228 from $240 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares ahead of its Q2 results. The firm has fine-tuned its forecasts for several items, including modestly reducing its Q2 forecasts for Event-driven proxy distribution activity and Distribution revenue, the analyst tells investors in a research note.Claim 50% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of
